#summary This page describes the datatypes created for use within the GL Service.

= Introduction =
There are currently seven GL datatypes used within the GL Service:

 * {{{Locus}}}
 * {{{Allele}}}
 * {{{AlleleList}}}
 * {{{Haplotype}}}
 * {{{Genotype}}}
 * {{{GenotypeList}}}
 * {{{MultilocusUnphasedGenotype}}}

Each GL String is made out of these components; for example, an {{{AlleleList}}} contains {{{Alleles}}} and {{{Loci}}}, separated by delimiters.

Each datatype can be registered in the GL Service individually.

= Details =

 * All seven datatypes implement the interface {{{GlResource}}}
 * Each contains its id, glstring, and a list of any subcomponents


===Locus:===
 * ID
 * GL String

===Allele:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * Accession number (link to IMGT or explanation)
 * {{{Locus}}}

===AlleleList:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * List of {{{Alleles}}}

===Haplotype:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * List of {{{AlleleLists}}}

===Genotype:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * List of {{{AlleleLists}}}
 * List of {{{Haplotypes}}}

===GenotypeList:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * Nothing else (sic)

===MultilocusUnphasedGenotype:===
 * ID
 * GL String
 * List of {{{GenotypeLists}}}
